page.title: 14Travelling through Linwood
page.content: Much traffic passes through{Linwood } and one of the busiest roundabouts is the {Clippens }roundabout.Traffic passing around this roundabout is travelling to and from{Glasgow, {Paisley, Johnstone, Bridge of Weir, {Houston}and{Linwood.}We went to the{ {Clippens}roundabout to find out how much traffic passes.We chose a quiet time because it would be easier to count traffic then.We found that in 10 minutes, 44 cars, 1 taxi, 3 lorries, 13 vans, 1 tractor and 1 bicycle came into{Linwood.}In that same 10 minutes, 55 cars, 1 taxi, 7 lorries, 1 bus and 13 vans went out of{Linwood.}Many people travelling around this area are going to work in{Paisley}and{Glasgow.} Many of the lorries and vans are carrying produce from nearby farms. Just think what the traffic would have been like at the rush hour!
